column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////We were still hungry so we ordered a mushroom empanada and the sirloin with shiitakes
column2: asparagus and potatoes. The empanada was huge for a tapas
column3: but the crust was flaky and the filling was earthy and had notes of sherry; it was delicious. The sirloin didn't have much flavor
column4: and it was cooked as ordered
column5: but it was a tough cut of meat
column6: so I'm not convinced it was sirloin. The accompanying vegetables were fine; the asparagus was a bit woody and tough
column7: but the mushrooms and potatoes were decent
